TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CollectionEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

summary.span: 提供可在設計階段編輯大部分集合型別的使用者介面。

span.span: Provides a user interface that can edit most types of collections at design time.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用關聯與屬性。The following code example uses an to associate the with a property. [!code-cpp[EditorAttributesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EditorAttributesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EditorAttributesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

para.span: 此編輯器可編輯集合具有屬性。

span.span: This editor can edit collections that have an property.

para.span: 編輯器可以判斷從集合的型別屬性，如果存在的話。

span.span: The editor can determine the type of the collection from the property, if it exists.

para.span: 如果集合並沒有這個屬性，或您想要提供多個型別的集合，您可以覆寫這個類別的特定受保護的成員自訂編輯器中，以支援其他類型的集合。

span.span: If the collection does not have this property, or if you want to provide collections of more than one type, you can override certain protected members of this class to customize the editor to support other types of collections.

span.span: The type of the collection for this editor to edit.

summary.span: 使用指定的集合型別，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified collection type.

summary.span: 取消對集合所做的變更。

span.span: Cancels changes to the collection.

para.span: 如果您需要執行額外的處理時至集合的變更會取消，請覆寫這個方法。

span.span: Override this method if you need to perform additional processing when changes to the collection are canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual bool CanRemoveInstance (object value);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanRemoveInstance(object value) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function CanRemoveInstance (value As Object) As Boolean
protected: virtual bool CanRemoveInstance(System::Object ^ value);

span.span: The value to remove.

summary.span: 指示集合的原始成員是否可移除。

span.span: Indicates whether original members of the collection can be removed.

returns.span: 如果容許從集合中移除這個值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if it is permissible to remove this value from the collection; otherwise, .

returns.span: 預設的實作 (Implementation) 一定會傳回 。

span.span: The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別中實作時，這個方法會指出是否可以從集合中移除指定的值。When implemented in a derived class, this method indicates whether the specified value can be removed from the collection. 根據預設，這個方法一律會傳回`true`。By default, this method always returns `true`. 當使用者嘗試移除原始成員的集合的項目時，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when the user tries to remove an item that is an original member of the collection. 移除目前編輯工作階段，因為它們不是尚未集合的一部分中所加入的項目時，不會呼叫這個方法。This method is not called when removing items that were added in the current editing session because they are not yet part of the collection.

protected: virtual bool CanSelectMultipleInstances();

summary.span: 指示是否可以一次選取多個集合項目。

span.span: Indicates whether multiple collection items can be selected at once.

returns.span: 如果可以同時選取多個集合成員，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if it multiple collection members can be selected at the same time; otherwise, .
By default, this returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會指出是否可以選取多個集合的成員集合編輯器對話方塊內。This method indicates whether multiple collection members can be selected within the collection editor dialog box.

summary.span: 建立要顯示和編輯目前集合的新表單。

span.span: Creates a new form to display and edit the current collection.

returns.span: ，做為用於編輯集合的使用者介面提供。

span.span: A to provide as the user interface for editing the collection.

para.span: 您可以繼承自提供您自己的表單。

span.span: You can inherit from to provide your own form.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual Type CreateCollectionItemType ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type CreateCollectionItemType() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function CreateCollectionItemType () As Type
protected: virtual Type ^ CreateCollectionItemType();

summary.span: 取得這個集合所包含的資料型別。

span.span: Gets the data type that this collection contains.

returns.span: 集合中項目的資料型別，或 (如果集合上沒有 屬性)。

span.span: The data type of the items in the collection, or an if no property can be located on the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以擷取的資料型別集合的項目從屬性，這是較快，這個方法。You can retrieve the data type of the items of the collection from the property, which is faster than this method. 不需要這個方法不由使用者呼叫，除非其中已覆寫並實作這個方法的衍生類別中。This method does not need to be called by users, except in derived classes where this method has been overridden and implemented. 這個方法的預設實作會傳回的資料型別`Item`屬性集合中，如果存在的話。The default implementation of this method returns the data type of the `Item` property of the collection, if it exists.

para.span: 開發人員可以選擇覆寫這個方法，以支援沒有遵循一般和支援的集合模型的集合或當效能嚴重不足，而且反映型型別解析太慢。

span.span: Developers can choose to override this method to support collections that do not follow the typical and supported collection model, or when performance is critical, and reflection-based type resolution is too slow.

summary.span: 建立指定集合項目型別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.

returns.span: 指定物件的新執行個體。

span.span: A new instance of the specified object.

para.span: 如果它無法建立指定類型的新執行個體，這個方法應該擲回例外狀況。

span.span: This method should throw an exception if it cannot create a new instance of the specified type.

summary.span: 取得這個集合編輯器可包含的資料型別。

span.span: Gets the data types that this collection editor can contain.

returns.span: 這個集合可包含的資料型別陣列。

span.span: An array of data types that this collection can contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以擷取的資料型別集合的項目從屬性，這是較快，這個方法。You can retrieve the data type of the items of the collection from the property, which is faster than this method. 不需要這個方法不由使用者呼叫，除非其中已覆寫並實作這個方法的衍生類別中。This method does not need to be called by users, except in derived classes where this method has been overridden and implemented. 這個方法的預設實作會傳回型別陣列中的所有集合項目類型。The default implementation of this method returns the type of all the collection items in a Type array.

para.span: 必須覆寫這個方法，以支援包含多個類型的集合。

span.span: This method must be overridden to support collections with multiple types.

para.span: 這個方法的預設實作會傳回的資料型別屬性集合中，如果存在的話。

span.span: The default implementation of this method returns the data type of the property of the collection, if it exists.

para.span: 若要覆寫的預設實作中使用這個方法。

span.span: Use this method to override the default implementation.

Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property HelpTopic As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ HelpTopic { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 當按下編輯器的對話方塊 [說明] 按鈕或 F1 鍵時，取得 Help 關鍵字以顯示說明主題或主題清單。

span.span: Gets the Help keyword to display the Help topic or topic list for when the editor's dialog box Help button or the F1 key is pressed.

value.span: 從編輯器要求說明時，所要顯示之說明主題或主題清單的 Help 關鍵字。

span.span: The Help keyword to display the Help topic or topic list for when Help is requested from the editor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫這個屬性，以顯示不同的說明主題。Override this property to display a different Help topic.

.property instance class System.Type[] NewItemTypes

summary.span: 取得可為這個集合建立的項目之可用型別。

span.span: Gets the available types of items that can be created for this collection.
The types of items that can be created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性表示可以加入至集合的資料類型。This property indicates the data types that can be added to the collection. 根據預設，這會傳回單一類型的。By default, this returns a single type of . 如果傳回多個類型，則集合編輯器 UI 會提供方法來選擇要建立的項目類型。If more than one type is returned, the collection editor UI provides a way to choose which item type to create.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual object SetItems (object editValue, object[] value);

Protected Overridable Function SetItems (editValue As Object, value As Object()) As Object
protected: virtual System::Object ^ SetItems(System::Object ^ editValue, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ value);

span.span: The collection to edit.

param.name: value
param.span: 要設定為集合項目的物件陣列。

span.span: An array of objects to set as the collection items.

summary.span: 設定指定的陣列為集合的項目。

span.span: Sets the specified array as the items of the collection.

returns.span: 新建立的集合物件，或者如果沒有的話，則為 參數所指示的集合。

span.span: The newly created collection object or, otherwise, the collection indicated by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設定需要，建立新的物件，則會傳回新的物件。If setting requires that a new object be created, the new object is returned. 否則，`editValue`會傳回參數。Otherwise, the `editValue` parameter is returned.
